name: Sebastian Maneth
content: Sebastian Maneth Sebastian Maneth Heisenberg Professor Arbeitsgruppe Datenbanken Postal Address: Universität Bremen, FB3, Postfach 330440, 28334 Bremen, Germany Office: MZH, Room 3350 Phone: +49 421 218 63600 Email: maneth@uni-bremen.de Research Interests: Databases Automata Theory and Applications Data Compression Publications: DBLP Google Scholar AG Datenbanken Lectures (Bremen) Lectures (Past) Applied Databases (University of Edinburgh, 2017) Applied Databases (University of Edinburgh, 2016) Effiziente Suche im Web (University of Leipzig, SS 2012) Web Data Compression and Search (UNSW, 1/2011) XML and Databases (UNSW, 1/2010) XML and Databases (UNSW, 1/2009) XML and Databases (UNSW, 1/2008) XML and Databases (UNSW, 2/2007) Logic and Automata (Canberra, December 2006) Type Systems (EPFL, 2004/05) Tree Transducers and XML (Tarragona, April 2004) Editorial Boards Editor of Theory of Computing Systems (TOCS) Associate Editor for Theoretical Computer Science of Frontiers in Computer Science Editor of Algorithms Conferences and Workshops PC member, CPM 2026 PC member, HUSO 2026 PC member, CIAA 2025 Invited Speaker, WPTE 2025 PC member, ALLDATA 2025 PC member, BTW 2025 PC member, CIAA 2024 Co-Organizer, Dagstuhl Seminar on Regular Expressions (November 2024) PC member, DLT 2024 PC member, STACS 2024 PC member, SCDM 2023 PC member, CIAA 2023 PC member, Highlights of Logic, Games and Automata 2022 PC member, CPM 2022 PC member, CIAA 2022 PC member, ALLDATA 2022 PC member, ACHI 2022 Invited Speaker, 31.
